com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.plugins.bluej

Class FileAuditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.plugins.bluej.FileAuditor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable

    public class FileAuditor
extends Object
implements Comparable
    Holds audit events for one file.
    Version:

    Rick Giles
